<s>[INST] Simplify the following: Of pertaining to or caused by rotation. [/INST] Having to do with spinning or rotating <s> Question: What is the meaning of the word rotational  Answer: Having to do with spinning or rotating  The word rotational is an adjective that describes something that is related to spinning or rotating. It can be used to describe a physical movement or a mathematical concept. For example, the rotational speed of a planet is the speed at which it spins on its axis. In mathematics, rotational symmetry is the property of an object where it looks the same after being rotated a certain angle. The word rotational is often used in physics and engineering to describe the motion of objects that are spinning or rotating.
